review: I am quite pleased with this addition to my kitchen.  It's sharp, looks nice, is reasonably sized, and easy to hold onto.  It was packaged very nicely, both the original plastic packaging as well as the shipping box thanks to Amazon prime.  I had a new quart of strawberries ready to test this on, and from the time I started opening the box my things were shipped in, it took 9 minutes to get the stems off of the whole quart of berries.  Not bad, actually fantastic considering that I have Parkinson's tremors.  I'd happily pay three times the price for this tool!
